table.name: vtiger_approvals
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_approvals` ( `approvalsid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `approvalfor` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `approval_status` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `sodetails` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `monthrelated` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `id` INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, `finance_approval` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`approvalsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_approvalscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_approvalscf` ( `vtiger_approvalscf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_approvalscf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
